subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|月|出|ls=ic|t1=moon|t2=to come out; to appear}}.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Perhaps from Austroasiatic; compare {{cog|km|ពន្លូត||to enlarge; to augment|lit=to cause to appear; to grow}}, from {{m|km|លូត||to sprout; to grow; to become longer}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} [[light]] of [[crescent moon]]
# {{†}} third day of a lunar month
# {{†}} {{lb|zh|of the moon|a star}} to [[rise]]
# {{†}} to [[approach]] [[daybreak]]
